mapper.insert: insert into ITEM_UNIT_CONVERT (CONVERT_ID, ITEM_ID, FROM_UOM, TO_UOM, CONVERT_RATE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, ENABLED_FLAG, START_ACTIVE_DATE, END_ACTIVE_DATE) values (#{convertId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fromUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{convertRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 1, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{startActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{endActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update INV_UNIT_CONVERT
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FROM_UOM = #{fromUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TO_UOM = #{toUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONVERT_RATE = #{convertRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CONVERT_ID = #{convertId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ITEM_UNIT_CONVERT set ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FROM_UOM = #{fromUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_UOM = #{toUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONVERT_RATE = #{convertRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONVERT_ID = #{convertId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT iib.ITEM_ID, iib.ITEM_NUMBER, iib.ITEM_NAME, iib.DESCRIPTION, iib.UOM_CODE FROM_UOM, fromUomCode.NAME FROM_UOM_NAME, ToUomCode.CONVERT_ID, ToUomCode.CONVERT_RATE CONVERT_RATE, ToUomCode.TO_UOM TO_UOM, ToUomCode.NAME TO_UOM_NAME, ToUomCode.END_ACTIVE_DATE END_ACTIVE_DATE FROM (select b.ITEM_ID, b.ITEM_NUMBER, t.ITEM_NAME, t.DESCRIPTION, b.UOM_CODE,b.VALIDATE_TO from INV_ITEM_B b LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_ITEM_TL t ON (t.ITEM_ID = b.item_id AND t.LANG = #{request.locale, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) iib LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select iuomtl.UOM_CODE, iuomtl.name FROM INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL iuomtl where iuomtl.LANG = #{request.locale, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) fromUomCode ON (iib.UOM_CODE = fromUomCode.UOM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select iuc.CONVERT_ID, iuc.ITEM_ID, iuc.CONVERT_RATE, iuc.TO_UOM, toUomCode.NAME , iuc.END_ACTIVE_DATE from INV_UNIT_CONVERT iuc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select iuomtl.UOM_CODE, iuomtl.name FROM INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL iuomtl where iuomtl.LANG = #{request.locale, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) toUomCode ON (iuc.TO_UOM = toUomCode.UOM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_B iuomb ON (iuc.TO_UOM = iuomb.UOM_CODE) ) ToUomCode on iib.ITEM_ID = ToUomCode.item_id where iib.ITEM_ID = #{itemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:

OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CONVERT_ID = #{convertId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
